endpoint.desc: Saisissez l'adresse du proxy Ollama, laissez vide si non spécifié localement
endpoint.title: Adresse du proxy

cors.description: Due to browser security restrictions, you need to configure cross-origin settings for Ollama to function properly.

linux.env: Add `Environment` under [Service] section, and set the OLLAMA_ORIGINS environment variable:
linux.systemd: Invoke systemd to edit the ollama service:

cors.macos: Open the Terminal application, paste the following command, and press Enter.
cors.reboot: Restart the Ollama service after the execution is complete.
cors.title: Configure Ollama for Cross-Origin Access
cors.windows: On Windows, go to 'Control Panel' and edit system environment variables. Create a new environment variable named 'OLLAMA_ORIGINS' for your user account, set the value to '*', and click 'OK/Apply' to save.

install.description: Veuillez vous assurer que vous avez activé Ollama. Si vous n'avez pas encore téléchargé Ollama, veuillez vous rendre sur le site officiel pour le <1>télécharger</1>.
install.docker: If you prefer using Docker, Ollama also provides an official Docker image. You can pull it using the following command:

linux.manual: Alternatively, you can refer to the <1>Linux Manual Installation Guide</1> for manual installation.

install.title: Install and Start Ollama Locally
